title: An Act relative to the provision and administration of bronchodilators, spacers, and nebulizers in schools

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Roy of Franklin, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 2526) of Jeffrey N. Roy relative to the provision and administration of bronchodilators, spacers, and nebulizers in schools.  Public Health.
